code: import{createAction}from"redux-actions";const CHANGEVIEWMODE="CHANGEVIEWMODE";export const ChangeViewMode=createAction(CHANGEVIEWMODE);const initalState={state:{viewMode:"card"}};export default function reducer(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initalState;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case CHANGEVIEWMODE:{return{state:{viewMode:action.payload}};}default:{return state;}}}
